speechRecognition

public static void speechRecognition(Activity activity,
                                     int maxResults,
                                     java.lang.String text)
Start google activity of speechRecognition (needed on onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent data) to call getSpeechRecognitionResults() to get the results)

Parameters:
activity - - activity
maxResults - - Max number of results that you want to get
text - - what will ask to user when activity start

getSpeechRecognitionResults

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getSpeechRecognitionResults(int requestCode,
                                                                                int resultCode,
                                                                                Intent data)
Get all results from the Google Speech Recognition activity (to be called onActivityResult())

Parameters:
requestCode - - onActivityResult request code
resultCode - - onActivityResult result code
data - - onActivityResult Intent data
Returns:
ArrayList with all results or null if was not possible to get any results

getSpeechRecognitionResultFromDicionary

public static java.lang.String getSpeechRecognitionResultFromDicionary(int requestCode,
                                                                       int resultCode,
                                                                       Intent data,
                                                                       java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> array)
Get the first result that matches the Result List from Google Speech Recognition activity (to be called onActivityResult()) and the Dictionary given

Parameters:
requestCode - - onActivityResult request code
resultCode - - onActivityResult result code
data - - onActivityResult Intent data
array - - Dictionary with all keywords
Returns:
String with the first result matched or null if was not possible to get any result

                                                               Intent data)

Parameters:
requestCode - - onActivityResult request code
resultCode - - onActivityResult result code
data - - onActivityResult Intent data
Returns:
string containing the first result of what was recognized

Parameters:

toast

public static void toast(Context context,
                         java.lang.String message,
                         int duration)
Quick toast method

Parameters:
context - context in which will be displayed
message - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
duration - How long to display the message. Either Toast.LENGTH_SHORT or Toast.LENGTH_LONG
